title: Disciple of Iban

properties.name: description
properties.value: Disciples of Iban support Iban and are located in the Underground Pass. They drop Zamorak robes and, if one does not have one in their bank or inventory and has completed Underground Pass, a broken Iban's staff, which can be repaired by bringing it and 200,000 coins to the Dark Mage in West Ardougne.

Monster ID8997

Disciples of Iban support Iban and are located in the Underground Pass. They drop Zamorak robes and, if one does not have one in their bank or inventory and has completed Underground Pass, a broken Iban's staff, which can be repaired by bringing it and 200,000 coins to the Dark Mage in West Ardougne.

Upon completion of the Underground Pass quest, they are no longer found in the Underground Pass.

To retrieve a new Iban's Staff (broken) you must now talk to Koftik at the entrance of the Underground Pass.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
28 November –
18 December 2006

The NPC was renamed from "Iban disciple" to "Disciple of Iban".

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • When the 'Talk' option is used when the player isn't wearing Zamorak robes, the disciple will call you an intruder and attack you.
  • They were removed from the Underground Pass after the completion of said quest with the release of Song of the Elves
